A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Got the impression that this was the pilot for a TV serial\, squandered the wealth and depth of material they had to build on\, whilst the Force Awakens was a disappointment this movie further contributed to my sense that this is a franchise in terminal decline.  Having been an avid follower of Star Wars for the last 40 years I am wondering if it would be best for me to not see future films for fear of contaminating my fond memories with this   thoughtless tripe.
